source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Creative Writing: Art, Business, & Craft of Young Adult Lit
items.headline: Award-winning YA author Tom Leveen walks you through writing your book, approaching agents, and more!
objectives_summary: Young adult fiction (or "YA lit") is still in demand. Learn how to make your YA stand out to agents, editors, and readers alike!
Learn from an award-winning author published with Penguin Random House, Simon & Schuster, and more
Craft the authentic teen voice every reader and editor expects from YA lit.

items.title: Writing Poetry: Zero to Hero
items.headline: Overcome your problems! Let's make you the poet you didn't think you could be.
objectives_summary: Overcome writers block
The secret to finishing a poem
Where to find consistent inspiration

items.title: Five-minute writing challenges - extended course
items.headline: Short and engaging creative writing activities
objectives_summary: KNOW the techniques great writers use
BE ABLE to use these techniques to create compelling and interesting descriptive writing
and, ENJOY experimenting with creative writing!

items.title: Digital Expertise for Educators
items.headline: Towards Excellence in Teaching Learning Pedogogy
objectives_summary: Confident/ Literate and Competent.

items.title: How To Write a Spy Thriller
items.headline: Get started with easy step by step instructions and guidance
objectives_summary: Learning how to write you first Spy Thriller can be really exciting.
In this course I will take you step by step through the process so that at the end you will be confident and capable of writing.
Learn Story Structure

items.title: Read like a writer and write a short story
items.headline: Intermediate level
objectives_summary: How to read like a writer and write a short story
How to deconstruct and examine in depth what makes a good short story
How to critically analyse short stories written by classic and contemporary fiction writers ranging from Katherine Mansfield, Richard Yates, James Joyce, Virginia Woolf to Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

items.title: Acrylic Painting - Colors Mastery Course
items.headline: The One & only Ultimate course you would ever need on the topic of colors. Mix any color & become a Colors Master NOW!
objectives_summary: 5 full length step-by-step acrylic painting tutorials
Secret tricks to mixing paints to achieve bright colors
Simplified color nomenclature

items.title: Mindfulness with Photography
items.headline: Use your camera or iPhone to explore different aspects of your life .
objectives_summary: We will help you take more thoughtful photos
Different photographic composition techniques
Become better at noticing and awareness

items.title: World Building: How to Create a Species/Race
items.headline: Master a step-by-step process to create fantasy and science fiction races without overwhelm and indecision!
objectives_summary: When you should invent original species/races
The difference between species and races and which term to use
How and why habitat affects their development and how to leverage this

items.title: Turn Your Story Into a Script, Solo Show, or Stand-Up
items.headline: Easy and fun course from a world renowned comedy guru
objectives_summary: Students will leave with the tools and skills to turn their story into an award-winning solo show, script or stand-up set.

items.headline: it's not about information. it's about transformation.
objectives_summary: The secret of wisdom
Why it's important to read books
How to keep a mindset of student

items.title: Plots+Scenes=Emotional Arc
items.headline: how to develop an emotional arc to your story
objectives_summary: Why developing a plot is so difficult
How the concept of a plot cloud can help with the plot development
Why scenes need an emotional change

items.title: Fiction Crash Course - Writing Skills & Methods for Success!

visible_instructors.job_title: Instructor / Writer / Teacher for over 20 years
visible_instructors.title: Trace Crawford
visible_instructors.name: Trace

items.headline: Learn the skills to write engaging fiction, develop your voice, and become the successful writer you want to be!
objectives_summary: This is a fun and practical fiction writing course designed to get you excited about creating your own work!
How to discover, perfect, and share your own writer's voice.
A series of authentic writing projects designed to target the skills you need.

items.title: Alcohol Ink Drinkware Resin Art | No Tumbler Needed
items.headline: Alcohol Ink Wine Glasses and Coffee mugs sealed in Resin |No Tumbler Needed
objectives_summary: How to create Alcohol Ink and Resin wine glasses and coffee cups without a tumbler

items.title: Writing Serial Fiction on Kindle Vella
items.headline: Kindle Vella -- a quick introduction -- write and publish your first episode of serial fiction
objectives_summary: Write serial fiction
Publish your first episode
Setup a Kindle Vella account

items.title: Find Your Creative Voice While Communing with God

visible_instructors.job_title: Creativity Helps Us to Grow, Heal, Change and Thrive
visible_instructors.title: Robin Norgren, M.A.
visible_instructors.name: Robin

items.headline: I will help you use your creativity as a way to connect with God. Soulful work through writing and creativity
objectives_summary: Explore Creativity as a means to connect with God
Integrate your Creativity and your Spiritual Life more deeply
Pinpoint the way in which you feel connected to God through embracing your creative outlets
